bibl.title: Pilgrimage to the Shrine of SS Cyrus and John at Menouthis in Late Antiquity.
Pilgrimage and Holy Space in Late Antique Egypt
bibl.author: MONTSERRAT, Dominic

bibl.note: I. Introduction. - II. The Establishment of the Christian Cult at Menouthis. - III. Sophronius and Pilgrimage to Menouthis in the Seventh Century. - IV. Conclusions.
MONTSERRAT Dominic, Pilgrimage to the Shrine of SS Cyrus and John at Menouthis in Late Antiquity.
David FRANKFURTER (Ed.), Pilgrimage and Holy Space in Late Antique Egypt = Religions in the Graeco-Roman World. 134 (Leiden, 1998) pp. 257-279.
